history.heading: “Software” controlled by 5D001.e.
history.title: “Software” controlled by 5D001.e.

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774 - The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: D. “Software”
5D001 “Software” as follows (see List of Items Controlled).
“Software” “specially designed” or modified for the “development”, “production” or “use” of equipment, functions or features controlled by 5A001;
history.text:
“Software” controlled by 5D001.e.
Special Conditions for STA
STA:
License Exception STA may not be used to ship or transmit 5D001.a “software” “specially designed” for the “development” or “production” of equipment, functions or features, specified by ECCN 5A001.b.3, .b.5 or .h. for “software” “specially designed” or modified to support “technology” specified by the STA paragraph in the License Exception section of ECCN 5E001 to any of the destinations listed in Country Group A:6 (See Supplement No. 1 to part 740 of the EAR).
List of Items Controlled
Related Controls:
See also 5D980 and 5D991.
Related Definitions:
N/A
Items:

content.text: License Exception STA may not be used to ship or transmit 5D001.a “software” “specially designed” for the “development” or “production” of equipment, functions or features, specified by ECCN 5A001.b.3, .b.5 or .h. for “software” “specially designed” or modified to support “technology” specified by the STA paragraph in the License Exception section of ECCN 5E001 to any of the destinations listed in Country Group A:6 (See Supplement No. 1 to part 740 of the EAR).
